home.description: With the help of this app, you can participate in various promotions that are held by different cafes.
home.checkNearby: Or check out the places near you right now

removeAccount.title: Data Deletion
removeAccount.message_1:
##### We have sent a code to your email, which you should enter below.
Please note that after completing this operation, all your data will be deleted ***without the possibility of recovery***.
removeAccount.instruction: Select the events you want to delete along with the account
removeAccount.confirmation: Your data has been successfully deleted

about.title: About the app
about.text:
#### Contacts you can use to reach us:

Email: [support@owncup.eu](mailto:support@owncup.eu)

permissions.locationDescription: Click here to display the distance to event locations

locationCard.title: Grant the location permission
locationCard.description: Location access is needed to show the list of offers from nearby locations

notificationCard.title: Grant notification permission
notificationCard.description: Please grant the app access to notifications so we can send you notifications about events you've added to favorites

unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribe from notifications
unsubscribe.text: Email notifications for your account have been disabled. You can enable them back or configure other notifications in the [settings](https://app.owncup.eu/settings).

create.title: Add offer
create.publishHint: You can publish an offer to visitors later at any time

create.descriptionExamplePromo: For example, "A croissant as a gift"
create.priceHelper: Cost for the whole package in euro cents
create.quantityHelperFree: If, for example, every third cup is free, enter "3"
